entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
